description: Users are distracted by the slider presentation of the pricing page, by converting it to a step based approach, more users will contact us.
name: INFU2: Step based pricing

changes.value: #pricing_tool{display:none}.infu2Wrapper{margin:0 auto;max-width:63rem}.infu2Wrapper .panel{padding:1rem;display:none}.infu2Wrapper.step1 .s1{display:block}.infu2Wrapper.step2 .s2{display:block}.infu2Wrapper.step3 .s3{display:block}.infu2Wrapper .contact{display:none}.infu2Wrapper.step3 .next{display:none}.infu2Wrapper.step3 .contact{display:block}.infu2Wrapper .content{background:#fff;padding:2rem;min-height:10rem}.infu2Wrapper h3{font-size:1.5rem;text-align:left;color:#4a5ac5;margin:1rem 0}.infu2Wrapper h4{font-size:1.5rem;margin:0 0 2rem 0;color:#333;float:none}.infu2Wrapper select{width:auto}.infu2Wrapper .checkbox{display:-webkit-box;display:-webkit-flex;display:-moz-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;width:100%;border:1px solid #eee;border-radius:5px;padding:1rem;text-align:left;cursor:pointer}.infu2Wrapper .checkbox:nth-of-type(1){margin-bottom:1rem}.infu2Wrapper .checkbox h3{font-size:1.8rem}.infu2Wrapper .box{width:50px;height:36px;padding:5px;margin-top:.5rem;margin-right:1rem;border:2px solid #4a5ac5}.infu2Wrapper .checkbox.active .box{background:#4a5ac5}.infu2Wrapper .pricing-tool{display:-webkit-box;display:-webkit-flex;display:-moz-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;text-align:left}.infu2Wrapper .pricing-tool .price{padding-right:4em;border-right:2px solid #eee}.infu2Wrapper .pricing-tool .old-price{text-decoration:line-through;color:#4a5ac5;text-align:left}.infu2Wrapper .pricing-tool .total-price{padding-top:2em}.infu2Wrapper .cHeader{font-size:1em;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:bold}.infu2Wrapper .checklist{list-style-type:none;display:-webkit-box;display:-webkit-flex;display:-moz-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-flex-wrap:wrap;-ms-flex-wrap:wrap;flex-wrap:wrap}.infu2Wrapper .checklist li{margin:0 0 1em 0;-webkit-flex-basis:50%;-ms-flex-preferred-size:50%;flex-basis:50%}.infu2Wrapper .x{display:none;font-weight:bold}.infu2Wrapper #infu2ecomm.disabled,.infu2Wrapper #infu2sales.disabled{display:none}.infu2Wrapper .disabled{color:#666}.infu2Wrapper .disabled .checkmark{display:none}.infu2Wrapper .disabled .x{display:inline-block}.infu2Wrapper .sc_buttons{margin:2em 0}.infu2Wrapper .sc{display:inline-block;width:1em;height:1em;border-radius:10px;border:2px solid #666;cursor:pointer}.infu2Wrapper .sc:nth-of-type(2){margin:0 1em}.infu2Wrapper.step1 .sc:nth-of-type(1){background:#666}.infu2Wrapper.step2 .sc:nth-of-type(2){background:#666}.infu2Wrapper.step3 .sc:nth-of-type(3){background:#666}.infu2Wrapper .price-calculated__promo_strip{padding:1rem .5rem;background-color:#3a3a3a;color:#fff;width:calc(100% + 4rem);text-align:center;position:absolute;left:-2rem;bottom:-2rem}.infu2Wrapper .price-calculated__promo_strip p{margin:0;font-size:100%;font-weight:700;line-height:24px}@media screen and (max-width: 580px){.infu2Wrapper h3{font-size:1rem}.infu2Wrapper .pricing-tool{-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-box-direction:normal;-webkit-flex-direction:column;-moz-box-orient:vertical;-moz-box-direction:normal;-ms-flex-direction:column;flex-direction:column}.infu2Wrapper .pricing-tool .price{border-right:0;padding-right:1rem;text-align:center}.infu2Wrapper .pricing-tool .checklist{padding-left:0}.infu2Wrapper .checklist{display:block}.infu2Wrapper .price-calculated__promo_strip{width:100%;position:static}}

attributes.html:
Pricing starts at

49

Turn leads into satisfied clients for one low monthly price

FAQs

What if i need help?

Our U.S.-based phone support team will happily answer all your questions. We also offer 24-7 live chat support, online help, and a library of how-to videos.

Can I cancel anytime?

Yes. (Ideally, you’ll never want to.)

Do you charge for emails or limit the number of emails I can send each month?

Emails are free and unlimited for everyone.

Is a Credit Card required for a Free Trial

No credit card required - click here and give it a try.

Is the software secure?

Absolutely. A full explanation of our security can be found here.

Can I add multiple users or more contacts later?

Our pricing plans include 1 user license. Additional users can be purchased for $29/month.

You can add more contacts to your client database at any time. We offer the following packages:

Contacts

Monthly Pricing

1,500

$99/mo

2,500

$149/mo

5,000

$199/mo

10,000

$249/mo

Higher volume plans available. Contact Sales for more details. +1 855 557 4968

Still have questions?

We've got answers.

Chat with sales

changes.value:
Client Manager

Access and update customer info anytime, anywhere in one place.

Communications

A simple, customizable way for new customers to learn more about your services and connect with you 24/7.

Appointments

Eliminate the scheduling back-and-forth. Fewer meeting mix-ups and no-shows.

Quotes, Estimates, Proposals

Faster and easier acceptance speeds up the process.

Online Invoicing & Payments

‘Pay now’ button on invoices means faster payments and money directly in your account.

Mobile

Your entire database in your pocket. Add notes and new contacts on the go.

Pricing plans to fit any sized business

Choose the plan that’s right for you.

Basic

Great for service businesses or those ready to level-up.

  • 3 Users
  • 2,500 contacts
$199

Plus one-time on-boarding fee of $299.*

Plus

Most popular plan, ideal for businesses ready to automate their sales pipeline or business processes.

  • 5 Users
  • 5,000 contacts
$299

Plus one-time on-boarding fee of $299.*

Premium

A complete solution for businesses looking to grow even faster — online and offline.

  • 10 Users
  • 10,000 contacts
$399

Plus one-time on-boarding fee of $299.*

*Collaborate with an onboarding expert to get set up and earning quickly.

Check out all the features

Start demo
Talk to sales

All the power & flexibility in one tool

Feature
Basic
Plus
Premium

CRM

Organizes your sales, marketing, customer info in one place.

Marketing Automation

Build and customize automated workflows for any business process.

Unlimited Landing Pages

Build fast with industry-specific templates.

Unlimited Emails

Use email to communicate with existing customers and nurture new leads through your process.

Invoices & Payments

An all-in-one payment and invoicing tool.

Sales Automation

Manage your entire sales pipeline, automatically qualify leads, set reminders and trigger automated emails, track sales team activity, and view forecasts and reports.
−

Online Selling

From lead capture to completing online transactions, it’s all here. Sell products, services, and subscriptions using our online storefront, shopping cart, and order forms.
−

'use strict';var utils=window.optimizely.get('utils'),newHtml='

We make it easier to make clients happy

Infusionsoft combines your essential tools in one app that takes the friction out of your client interactions.

Client info
Appointments
Quotes
Invoices
Payments
Sales pipeline
Start free trial

No credit card required

Try our demo

The best way to get it all done in a workday

Better organize your client information. Get important daily work done faster. Make every client interaction a winner. All in Infusionsoft.

Client information at your fingertips

Access key client data, add detailed notes, and sync your calendar on your mobile device. You\u2019re always informed, up to date, and ready in any situation.

Learn more

Quit the back-and-forth appointment hassles

Send a link to your client and they\u2019ll select a time based on your availability. Once booked, a confirmation email is sent and your Google Calendar updates automatically.

Learn more

Take the friction out of winning work and getting paid

Send quotes that clients approve with one click. Fire off invoices and collect payments in the app. And automatically send reminders to follow up until they act.

Learn more

Your business tools in one platform just makes sense

An array of tools that don\u2019t work seamlessly are a drag on your business. Infusionsoft is the all-in-one system proven to elevate your service and grow your business.

Learn more

What you get:

  • Client management

  • Unlimited emails

  • Appointments

  • Quotes

  • Invoices

  • Payments

  • Sanity

  • Happy clients

Starting at

$99/mo
